data Doc
  • = Fail
  • | Empty
  • | Char Char
  • | Text !Int String
  • | Line
  • | FlatAlt Doc Doc
  • | Cat Doc Doc
  • | Nest !Int Doc
  • | Union Doc Doc
  • | Column (Int -> Doc)
  • | Columns (Maybe Int -> Doc)
  • | Nesting (Int -> Doc)
  • | Color ConsoleLayer ColorIntensity Color Doc
  • | Intensify ConsoleIntensity Doc
  • | Italicize Bool Doc
  • | Underline Underlining Doc
  • | RestoreFormat (Maybe (ColorIntensity, Color)) (Maybe (ColorIntensity, Color)) (Maybe ConsoleIntensity) (Maybe Bool) (Maybe Underlining)
name: Doc RestoreFormat Underline Italicize Intensify Nesting Columns Column Union Nest Cat FlatAlt Line Empty Fail Text Char Color
